column4: is there a  repository for gnome themes, icons, etc.  besides the one that comes with gnome-art by default?  thanks
About 99% of the time, there are no dependencies for the themes
for example, the Tactile theme also has a gtk theme to go with it.  and it would make life easier if i can just use "apt-get" to install them.
Like Killeroid said, it is impossible to package that many themes
